item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series! Come out and raise a pint (or whatever you fancy) to celebrate the NHC's 250th happy hour.

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:

Geronimo

Your contact for this event is Ben: 203-554-5144.

Specials include:

- Complimentary finger food buffet
- $3 domestic beers
- $5 glasses, house wine
- $5 well drinks
- $5 house margaritas

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...
Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.

Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Geronimo: The NHC's 250th Happy Hour!
